title: The leaver-busters keep glitching on me
body: My first time was when the 20 minute bans just passed and i'm waiting for a match to be found but the time stopped at 20:01. It stayed like that for the longest time. The second time I did today had a problems too! I waited 20 mins patiently, the match was found but than during the champion select it froze on me AGAIN and it said it was my fault for leaving and i had to wait 20 mins ban again. No league...no more jeez i'm fed up with waiting 20 mins bans and getting all this bugs or glitches on my leaver busters . is it possible to fix this ;-;

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like your client might be messing up while you're in the low-priority queue, which would make it difficult to actually get out of it. Let's troubleshoot that first before you try queueing back up to make sure the timer doesn't eventually get increased from you being forced out of champ select. 

First, go into your client options and turn on low-spec mode. That will give your client an easier time dealing with the background animations and you should be able to get through champ select. Make sure to test it in a custom or practice match before queueing back up, and let me know if it helps.
